normalizeChecks

public com.google.common.base.Predicate<Event>[][] normalizeChecks()
normalize the event matching expression. The first dimension binds its contents with a logical AND and the second dimension with a logical OR. Predicates are constructed by this method to directly operate on Events.

Returns:
the normal form of the expression.
